Name: King Cole Cocktail
Ingredients: 50 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange & pineapple slices.
Review: Fernet-loving folk will appreciate this herbal digestivo.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of King Cole Cocktail contains 161 calories
